content: Hmm... I'm already thinking about upgrading to a bigger house.

Mobai told me there's an upgrade service for houses,
Pay the corresponding fee
and you can get a bigger house!

Somehow... my heart flutters at the thought.
After all, you always want the very best for your home.

As I fill my home with furniture made by my own hands,
piece by piece,
it feels like loneliness is being pushed away, little by little.

Watching my home grow from a humble tent into something bigger,
This satisfaction of witnessing my own growth
It's absolutely mesmerizing~

I'm thinking about asking Mobai
about new house upgrade services...
